title: Junjou Renka
description:
1. Caged Hawk: A haughty ojou-sama is sold into prostitution when her family fall on hard times, and her former servants know where she works.

2-4. Rindou: A manor deep in the mountain. A girl trained to bond with men in power, believing a legend that what she does keep the nation prospering. Rindou performs her duty unquestionably, until the day she meets a young apprentice who tells her about the outside world.
(The tags mostly apply to this story)

5. Dogeza no Kadou

6-7. Border Between Nobility and Taboo: A sadistic snob cant stand a poor girl who ignores him at school, so he proceeds to teach her a lesson.

8. Noblesse ☆ Oblige: Girl from an upstart family is anxious to learn from her prim and proper classmate about duties of high class ladies.

matches.title: The Mad Prince's Distorted Love Prisoner ~ A Genderbent Knight
